      1 package main
      2 
      3 import (
      4 	"encoding/json"
      5 	"flag"
      6 	"fmt"
      7 	"log"
      8 	"os"
      9 
     10 	"github.com/livegrep/livegrep/cmd/livegrep-index-builder/codehost"
     11 )
     12 
     13 var (
     14 	flagIndexName           = flag.String("index-name", "livegrep-index", "name of the generated index")
     15 	flagRepoBasePath        = flag.String("repo-base-path", "/tmp", "working directory on disk for storing repositories")
     16 	flagOutIndexConfig      = flag.String("out-index-config", "index.json", "path on disk to save the livegrep index config")
     17 	flagSSHPrivateKeyPath   = flag.String("ssh-private-key-path", "", "path to the private key for SSH authentication; defers to the SSH agent if empty")
     18 	flagSSHSkipHostVerify   = flag.Bool("ssh-skip-host-verify", false, "skip server host identity verification for SSH authentication")
     19 	flagRepoSyncConcurrency = flag.Int("repo-sync-concurrency", 5, "concurrency limit for repository synchronization")
     20 	flagCodeHost            = newChoicesFlag([]string{codehost.Gitlab, codehost.Static}, "")
     21 	flagCodeHostParams      = newStringMapFlag()
     22 
     23 	codehostBackends = map[string]codehost.Factory{
     24 		codehost.Gitlab: codehost.NewGitLabCodeHost,
     25 		codehost.Static: codehost.NewStaticCodeHost,
     26 	}
     27 )
     28 
     29 func init() {
     30 	flag.Var(flagCodeHost, "codehost", "name of the codehost backend to use")
     31 	flag.Var(flagCodeHostParams, "codehost-param", "key-value parameter used to configure behavior of the codehost backend")
     32 
     33 	flag.Parse()
     34 }
     35 
     36 func main() {
     37 	/* Initialization of the code host client */
     38 
     39 	codeHostFactory, ok := codehostBackends[flagCodeHost.Choice()]
     40 	if !ok {
     41 		panic(fmt.Errorf("unknown codehost backend: codehost=%s", flagCodeHost.Choice()))
     42 	}
     43 
     44 	codeHost, err := codeHostFactory(flagCodeHostParams.Values())
     45 	if err != nil {
     46 		panic(err)
     47 	}
     48 
     49 	projects, err := codeHost.ListProjects()
     50 	if err != nil {
     51 		panic(err)
     52 	}
     53 
     54 	log.Printf("listed projects from codehost backend: codehost=%s projects=%d", flagCodeHost.Choice(), len(projects))
     55 
     56 	/* Generate a livegrep index config and write it to disk */
     57 
     58 	cfg := indexConfig(*flagIndexName, *flagRepoBasePath, projects)
     59 
     60 	cfgJSON, err := json.Marshal(&cfg)
     61 	if err != nil {
     62 		panic(err)
     63 	}
     64 
     65 	if err := os.WriteFile(*flagOutIndexConfig, cfgJSON, 0644); err != nil {
     66 		panic(err)
     67 	}
     68 
     69 	log.Printf("wrote livegrep index configuration: path=%s", *flagOutIndexConfig)
     70 
     71 	/* Synchronize the repositories requested for indexing */
     72 
     73 	var syncTasks []taskClosure
     74 
     75 	for _, project := range projects {
     76 		syncTasks = append(syncTasks, func(project *codehost.Project) taskClosure {
     77 			return func() error {
     78 				log.Printf(
     79 					"synchronizing repository: name=%s remote=%s revision=%s path=%s",
     80 					project.Name,
     81 					project.Remote,
     82 					project.Revision,
     83 					project.RepositoryPath(*flagRepoBasePath),
     84 				)
     85 
     86 				opts := &authenticationOptions{
     87 					sshPrivateKeyPath: *flagSSHPrivateKeyPath,
     88 					sshSkipHostVerify: *flagSSHSkipHostVerify,
     89 				}
     90 
     91 				err := syncRepository(project, *flagRepoBasePath, opts)
     92 				if err != nil {
     93 					log.Printf("encountered synchronization error: name=%s err=%v", project.Name, err)
     94 				}
     95 
     96 				return err
     97 			}
     98 		}(project))
     99 	}
    100 
    101 	if errs := executeTasks(syncTasks, *flagRepoSyncConcurrency); len(errs) > 0 {
    102 		panic(fmt.Errorf("repository synchronization encountered nonzero errors: errs=%d", len(errs)))
    103 	}
    104 
    105 	log.Printf("repository synchronization complete")
    106 }
